message: Let's start fair. I propose a 51/49 split in my favor. What do you say?
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  The money will be worth less next round anyway.
I think we can both do better. Let's split the money evenly this time. It's only a matter of time before inflation hurts us both if we keep going back and forth.
